name: Fast Car Race Cup
description:
Fast Car Race Cup is a racing game that you absolutely can not miss
This classic game has all the racing enthusiasts want to have: from nobody to the most wanted, you will use your excellent driving skills to win a higher performance car
Features:
- real racing experience with action features
- 7 sport auto racing to choice
- drive fast tap accelerator and collect coins
- extreme speed in realistic 3D scenes
